Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Darkangel : :

The bat's flight ability allowed him to dodge Maxima's shots. Perceptor's however, struck his wings. Darkangel dropped from the sky, nearly hitting the ground before controling his flight again.

He returned fire on Perceptor with 10 plasma shots.


EmprzAnastazia@... wrote:
In a message dated 7/2/03 3:38:13 PM Central Daylight Time, roborick007@... writes:


Darkangel aligns himself for a shot from the air and releases four plasma charges at Maxima.



A shot took out the right wing after clipping her silver, feathery mane. Stumbling back. As she turned to fire at Darkangel another clipped her in the side. 

She growled & sent off 3 series of 5 rounds rapid at Darkangel.
